title: Two Wall mount TVs 4brm 2bath 2 laundry centers Bring your toys+Dogs
posting_body: ['Fully furnished home 2 king beds 3 queen beds.', ' 2 Queen size futons and a Twin Sleeper even has a solid bassinet.', ' Outdoor kitchen with 5 grills - 2 on 2nd floor outdoor patio and 3 in outside.', 'Also has outdoor propane fire pit.', " Fenced back yard with double gate and 40' dog run with atro-turf and 2 Doogie doors.", 'The dog run also has Hot and cold water lines so you can keep the astro-turf clean.', "Also just installed 2 brand new 50 gallon hot water heaters so you'd never have a problem with hot water again when filling up the indoor hot tub upstairs.", '  2 of the hot water heaters were just installed brand new they are 50 gallons linked together  so that you  have 100 gals of water water always on hand.', ' No problems with the laundry centers and the large built in hot tub upstairs getting hot water all the time.', 'The 3 hot water heaters would easily take care of all your hot water needs.', 'and 4 parking outdoor parking spaces all behind custom locking metal gates .', '   Has great indoor/outdoor kitchen huge frig, sink with extra hot line and prep cooler.', 'Old Littleton  2 level house house Brand new stack-able W+D included upstairs in walk-in closet and full size washer dryer  high end set downstairs.', 'Also included that are already set up are 2 wall mount 65" Ultra HDTV\'s one on main level and one downstairs.', '  Sky lights in the kitchen and bathroom.', ' with large driveway parking for 4 cars.', 'No garage available-Landlord keeps garage.', ' If you want the garage which is 3 car which would run an additional $1500/mo.', 'Also has additional rock parking are in back that runs an ADDITIONAL $500/mo if you have toys see last 2 pics.', ' Landlord built this area for his boat and truck.', ' 10 blocks from the Littleton light rail station and Downtown Littleton.', 'Mountain Views Private Deck.', ' Incredible Mountain views from your 2 person  tub inside upstairs and with copper double sinks and awesome 5 piece bath vaulted ceiling.', 'Master executive loft suite is super private away from the rest of the house in a private wing setting.', 'Massive Walk in closet with your own private brand new stack able washer and dryer.', ' Also has 2 way gas fireplace in master suite and adjoining living room.', 'Master suite has private 2nd floor deck great for sunbathing and romantic cook outs for two.', 'ALL OF FURITURE AND 2 NEW TVS ALL INCLUDED.', 'IF YOU HAVE ALL OF YOUR OWN STUFF BE HAPPY TO RENT THIS HOUSE EMPTY', 'BUT THE RENTAL RATE WOULD BE THE SAME.', ' $5000/month with $5000 Security Deposit.', 'REQUIRED 2 YEAR LEASE.', 'Discounts available for additional years signed past the base 2 years.', 'Have install 2 doggie door so that your dogs can walk themselves a great feature for dog owners.', ' No getting up in the middle of the night to walk your pooches.', " The doggy doors also have great solid covers so if you travel no critters will get in or if you don't have dogs you can just leave the covers on permanently locked", 'big dogs with extra deposit and no dogs under 2 years old.', 'No more than 2 dogs ABSOLUTELY  NO CATS', 'All utilities will be paid by tenants.', '1st months rent and deposit must be paid at lease signing and move in and key codes of your choice.', ' Top of the line key pad entry code locks so no keys to carry around.', ' Also has several grills and smokers included on main level and 2 on 2nd floor patio.', 'The front part of the house that has separate entrance and NO access to the back part of the house that is a 2 bedroom 1 bath is rented til 8/15/22 to a single man.', ' When he  moves out you will have 1st choice on that space but it rents for an additional $2500/mo.', ' Close to Windimere and Ridge road call JDV 72zero 35seven 202nine']
